::The Galactors::

The two jets picked up the new enemies coming up on their scanners. 
They both turn, flying toward Unicron and the Brotherhood. The 
Supernova/Flare jet fires three missiles at Unicron, one from one 
wing and one from the other, while the Vycir/Slasys/Scrap jet fires 
three large plasma blasts at Vehement.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Airly, an energy-signature seeking missile tracks the energy-
signature of a 
> bot.  It focuses in on the energy-signature.  Flying side to side 
wouldn't 
> exactly dodge it.  Just wanted to let you know that)
> 
> 
> Unicron/Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Unicron didn't smile or show any emotion.  After Darkfate's reply, 
his 
> opinion of the being was that Darkfate was somewhere between a 
cockroach and 
> the organic matter pond scum feeds upon.
> 
> Moving sharp left through the air he dodged all but two shots that 
struck him 
> in his armored right abs, but he was relatively undamaged.  He sent 
a plan to 
> his followers via inner monologue comm and he began activating 
several 
> algorithms inside the Ramora.
> 
> Raising both arms he fired four missiles, all energy-signature 
seeking 
> missiles, two from each arm, down at Darkfate.
> 
> ---
> 
> Vehement nodded at what seemed a sound plan from Unicron, firing 
off ten 
> rapid optic blasts at a bat probe.  Raising his left arm, he 
charged up a 
> sonic wave and launched an invisible wave of destructive sonic 
energy down 
> towards Darkfate.  Raising his right arm, the barrel that was there 
instead 
> of the arm fired off three fire balls at Shivah.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher raised an arm, launching two energy-signature seeking 
missiles 
> from a barrel at the bottom of his wrist, the missiles heading for 
Alecto.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector would've liked to comply with his master, but there were 
to many 
> shots.  Forming a black orb in his hands, he threw it forward and 
made it 
> prematurely explode, intercepting all the lasers.  The flames from 
the blast 
> lightly scorched him, but he was relatively unhurt.  He fired off 
three optic 
> blasts at Perceptor's abdomen.
